Title: The working class gives the best example of how to enthusiastically and thriftly run a factory
Publisher: Hebei sheng Shijiazhuang diqu tuchan gongsi (河北省石家庄地区土产公司), Shijiazhuang
Notes: Factory workers pick up and collect mislaid or faulty finished products for recycling. Poster published by the Hebei Province Shijiazhuang area local products company.Part of a series of four.
